content:
Hi All, I am just starting out to this development field & I thought i could contribute to this project

The design i thought could be interesting is in the mobile version Hamburger menu is there but there is no animation when we click its just statically opening so i am thinking of may be adding a little bit of transition like the top & bottom line gets rotated @45 deg when clicked

Can i start with it ?
image.png
image-1.png
A message was moved here from #design > recent conversations for streams by Aman (amanagr).
I would be interested to see it.

we don't have animations anywhere else, so having them only on a single kind of not great :smile:
Anyway contribution in from of PR is welcome and it could be a start of other animations on the future hello page.
Yeah Just Sharing the Ideas I am Setting up the development environment and I am completely new to contributions..So i'll try and share the results If its ok I can raise a PR
